title: Touchpad question
body: I don't have a mouse at the moment but I was wondering how do I make it so that when I double tap on my touchpad, my summoner moves to that location, currently is bided to right click but is not comfortable at all. When I try to bid it to 'double tap' it remains at right click. thanks in advance

replies.body: League has a few reserved keys that can't be changed, including the right click.  Even if you may change the setting through your OS, it may not function the same in-game.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if our tech team can help individually and might be able to find a solution on this.  We'll reply as soon as we can!
